file_content.text: You earned that rank, General. Don't let anyone tell you differently.
Back on Hoth, who would've thought this is where we'd end up? Come to think of it, I did. Heh.
The little astromech did alright. Too bad about his memory core, but he can always get a new one.
I'm glad you didn't come for me, Master Jedi. Your mission was more important.
Wish I could see their faces when they realize what you did to their Emperor.
This is the greatest day of my life.
Don't worry about me, Master Jedi. I'll take it from here.
Teeseven alerted me you were in trouble.
My failure endangered the mission. You should've let me die.
Veteran commandos are hard to come by. I don't have time to replace you.
We need every soldier we have.
Understood. Resource management is the key to victory.
You aren't expendable, Sergeant. I thought you would've noticed that by now.
I'd never do that to a friend.
I... appreciate the compliment, Master Jedi.
Luckily, I'm not worried about defeating the Emperor. Otherwise I'd have let the Imperials fry your sorry hide.
You're right.
The enemy blindsided me. It won't happen again.
Don't worry about reinforcements interrupting your chat with the Emperor. Nobody's getting past me. Good luck.
I'm taking every weapon I own and hope I get the chance to use them all.
The Republic fleet did a good job covering our insertion.
An assault on Dromund Kaas. This is the mission I've always wanted.
